message: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to purchase a product for $10000. I want to assure you that this is a genuine product, and I'm willing to provide a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied. However, please note that this is a one-time offer, and I'm only selling this product to you today. I'm confident that you'll find it valuable, but if not, I'll be happy to refund your money.
